title: Yudie
creator_credit: New Day Films and Mirra Bank
brief_description: An old Jewish lady talks about her life on the East Side of New York City particularly recalling the strong sense of community and the concern felt by old migrants for newer ones.
description: An old Jewish lady talks about her life on the East Side of New York City particularly recalling the strong sense of community and the concern felt by old migrants for newer ones.
